name: Elf Factory
description:
This is a challenging speed puzzle game  where you have to sort through an inventory of toy parts assembling toys on Christmas Eve to save Christmas. This is meant to only play on the Playdate


This game was built with my 9, 5 and 3 year olds, originally for Playdate Jam 2 (Crank it to Make it). With the holidays and a wee bit of scope creep, here we are 2 days after Christmas releasing a Christmas game :)

Other games by me:

Jewel Defender

Behind the scenes:


We discovered that 3x5 index cards have the exact same aspect ratio as the playdate screen, so all images are based off of hand drawn art from the kids.
